alert.note: Alert for Eastern Ulster; Western Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 6:49PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Ulster County through 745 PM EDT... At 649 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bloomingburg, or 8 miles south of Ellenville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause ponding of water. Locations impacted include... New Paltz, Ellenville, Wallkill, Plattekill, Modena, High Falls, Kerhonkson, Tillson, Napanoch, Wawarsing, Lloyd, Crawford, Gardiner, Tuckers Corner, Forest Glen, Dwaarkill, Awosting, Elting Corners, Ireland Corners and Cragsmoor. This includes Interstate 87 near exit 18. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
